text: Deathcore is a type of music which mixes the sounds of death metal with metalcore. ==Bands== * Heavy Heavy Low Low * Bring Me the Horizon (early) * Suicide Silence * Job for a Cowboy * Despised Icon * Through the Eyes of the Dead * All Shall Perish * As Blood Runs Black * Chelsea Grin * With Blood Comes Cleansing * Whitechapel * Caliban * Ov Sulfur * Carnifex * Oceano ==References== Category:Heavy metal subgenres Category:Fusion music genres
title: Deathcore
